SELECT tpi.key_id, tpi.plan_object, tpi.player_id, tpi.plan_date, tpi.complete_flag FROM tran_plan_info tpi LEFT JOIN player_info pi ON pi.key_id = tpi.player_id AND pi.delete_flag = 0 WHERE tpi.delete_flag = 0
